vb6:1.1: saḷāyatanaṁ → chaṭṭhāyatanaṁ (sya2ed) | chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā → saḷāyatanapaccayā (si, cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1)
vb6:40.1: nāmasampayuttaṁ chaṭṭhāyatanaṁ → nāmarūpasampayuttaṁ saḷāyatanaṁ (si); nāmasampayuttaṁ (sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1); nāmasampayuttaṁ saḷāyatanaṁ (sya2ed)
vb6:240.2: dvidhāpatho → dvedhāpatho (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | apariyogāhaṇā → apariyogāhanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
vb6:272.3: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ → paṭhamajjhānaṁ (si) | pathavīkasiṇaṁ → paṭhavīkasiṇaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
